item.title: Hector Padin Torrente
item.description: AI & Cibersecurity 锔 路 GitHub 路 LinkedIn 路 TryHackMe 路 HackMyVM Hi , I am Hector! a master’s student in Cybersecurity and graduated in Computer Engineering (major in CS). I currently work researching on the security offered by different Coding techniques in the field of Federated Learning. I have a high background in Pentesting/Red-Team techniques and advanced knowledge of different Machine Learning techniques. Looking forward to continue learning and increasing my skills.
